name: HexConnex
description:
Develop the barren geometric landscape of Hexagonia with an influx of lucrative transport tiles.

Connect matching tiles to make full lines in any of 3 axes. If you're really ambitious, try to aim for a perfect board!

Controls: drag-and-drop (mouse recommended). Touch devices may work, to some degree.

If you enjoy this, play the full game and submit your highscore on http://hexconnex.marthost.uk - or even check out my other games on itch.io.
